https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5grbkwNnMylKw9dGq0X6CGn7E4O.jpg Nandu and Vijay are brothers, who were abused by their stepmother during their younger days. Nandhu, who is mentally ill, decides to kill Vijay's fiancee as he visualizes her as his stepmother. Aalavandhan
